info.name: Qiy Node
info.description:
This document describes the Qiy Node API:
a [Qiy Node](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/High-Level%20Architectural%20Overview.md#43-qiy-node) is a [Node](http://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/archimate3-doc/chap10.html#_Toc489946084) that hosts  a single [Technology Service](http://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/archimate3-doc/chap10.html#_Toc489946097) which enables a single [Individual](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/High-Level%20Architectural%20Overview.md#41-qiy-users) to subscribe to and orchestrate his services as follows:
1. The Individual chooses and launches an [End User App](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#7428b29e-a414-493a-82e2-b39dabd2d5dc).
2. The [Individual subscribes to services](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#5656025c-a1e0-4b20-8442-1c5a25d24d89).
3. A [Relying Party may ask an Individual for feeds to consume services](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#580a707c-16e8-40b3-9ae4-c51ffa096033).
4. The [Individual may provide the service himself or instead deploy subscribed services](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#b81e75d9-cc97-4be1-ac17-976737e516de).
5. The [Relying Party receives feeds and consumes the services](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#abf8f21c-0f31-4086-ad5e-49d2ec468f43).

item.name: Registration
item.description:
[Service Providers]() and [Application Providers]() can register with an [Access Provider]():
1. both receive an [Access Provider Token]()
2. Service Providers can whitelist [endpoints]() and receive a [Qiy Node Credential]().

item.name: Service Desk
item.description: For contact details of the Digital Me Service Desk, please refer to [section 2.1 Service Desk](https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node.md#21-service-desk) of the [Digital Me Qiy Node specification](https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node.md#1-introduction).

item.name: Versions
item.description:
This api is versioned using [Semantic Versioning 2.0.0](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html) and follows this specification. In addition, the following rules apply:
* [Digital Me](https://digital-me.nl/) supports two major versions in the production environment: one primary version and one secundary version.
* [Digital Me](https://digital-me.nl/) will support a secundary version for at least 6 months.
* [Digital Me](https://digital-me.nl/) supports one development version in a development environment.
* A development version may change at any time.

item.name: Authentication
item.description:
In order to be able to access a Qiy Node, a Qiy Node Client MUST have:
1. A Qiy Node Credential consisting of a Qiy Node Id, a primary key and a Transport Password.
2. A valid Access Provider Token.

## Access Provider Token
All requests to a Qiy Node MUST be authenticated with a valid Access Provider Token.

## Authorization Header Parameter
All requests but the [Qiy Node Create Request](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#de1a3109-4fca-43f8-ab01-11436d62d097) and the [Api Request](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#22714043-ebc0-4a1d-87eb-2d469c8d3b82) MUST be authenticated with a correct Authorization header, for details see [chapter 4 Authentication](https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node.md#4-authentication) of the [Digital Me Qiy Node specification](https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node.md#1-introduction).
See [GET Api](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#22714043-ebc0-4a1d-87eb-2d469c8d3b82) for an example of an authenticated request.

## Password Header Parameter
Request that require the use of the Transport Layer MUST be authenticated with a valid Transport Passowrd in the 'password' header parameter of the request.
See also [the Qiy Node requests that have been labeled as 'Transport Requests'](https://htmlpreview.github.io/?https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node-api.html#TransportRequests) in the [Digit Me Qiy Node API in Open API format](https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node-api.json).

item.name: Dynamic Endpoint Addresses
Connect Token Endpoint
item.description:
This endpoint can be used to [request](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#9251bd1f-c8d9-49e1-91fb-a9a567a68aef) or [register](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#930a6f9b-00ad-4206-9420-e393cafde2d5) [Connect Tokens](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#815d43f7-d59f-4293-994d-1543d244cb1c).
The current address of the endpoint is returned in the "ctCreate"-member of the response of [Get endpoint addresses](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#55a3f041-17af-4b0d-bf8c-0b959b126428).

item.name: Connect Token List Endpoint
item.description:
This endpoint can be used to [list Connect Tokens](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#366060cb-b312-418d-a677-7650d6a80a1f).
The current address of the endpoint is returned in the "ctList"-member of the response of [Get endpoint addresses](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#55a3f041-17af-4b0d-bf8c-0b959b126428).

item.name: Connection Create Endpoint
item.description:
The Connection Create Endpoint can be used to [create a connection](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#96dd4e14-3580-4230-b859-a117000906f5).
The current address of the endpoint is returned in the "scan"-member of the response of [Get endpoint addresses](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#55a3f041-17af-4b0d-bf8c-0b959b126428).

item.name: Connection Endpoint
item.description:
This endpoint can be used to [get the details of a connection](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#0b8d52c5-0338-490a-8c4f-eab25fc3fcd7).
The endpoint urls are returned by [Request connection](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#01a84413-0b4c-47da-948a-824082408b40) and [List connections](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#0b8d52c5-0338-490a-8c4f-eab25fc3fcd7).

item.name: Connections List Endpoint
item.description:
The Connections List Endpoint can be used to [list connections](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#0b8d52c5-0338-490a-8c4f-eab25fc3fcd7).
The current address of the endpoint is returned in the "ctList"-member of the response of [Get endpoint addresses](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#55a3f041-17af-4b0d-bf8c-0b959b126428).

item.name: Events Endpoint
item.description:
The Events Endpoint can be used to [receive events](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#7830f7e9-d182-4b51-a2e6-058cdfead040).
The current address of the endpoint is returned in the "events"-member of the response of [Get endpoint addresses](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#55a3f041-17af-4b0d-bf8c-0b959b126428).

item.name: Mailbox Endpoint
item.description:
This endpoint can be used to [send](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#9ba1358d-ed56-42ac-8f21-73a9c8dba1ca) and [receive](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#1ef027e0-7e0f-431e-9389-5fe1eb8b111e) [messages](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#2a0c6c4b-bd2a-4b65-9282-bfdad3c1da81).
The current address of the endpoint is returned in the "mbox"-member of the response of [List connections](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#0b8d52c5-0338-490a-8c4f-eab25fc3fcd7).

item.name: Node Settings Endpoint
item.description:
This Endpoint can be used to [get](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e927ef5a-f501-421d-9c05-9a529a24058c) and [set](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#9ef7d36d-4611-4ce4-a19e-e3bb380233cf) [settings of a Qiy Node](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#dc161dbb-f4e5-4b62-b26b-975433718438).
The current address of the endpoint is returned in the "nodeSettings"-member of the response of [Get endpoint addresses](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#55a3f041-17af-4b0d-bf8c-0b959b126428).

item.name: Node Create Endpoint
item.description:
This endpoint can be used to [create a Qiy Node](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#de1a3109-4fca-43f8-ab01-11436d62d097).
The current address of the endpoint is returned in the "create"-member of the response of [Get endpoint addresses](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#55a3f041-17af-4b0d-bf8c-0b959b126428).

item.name: Node Delete Endpoint
item.description:
This Endpoint can be used to [delete a Qiy Node](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#1fdf73e7-e628-4513-a331-4428170dbcfb).
The current address of the endpoint is returned in the "Link"-header of the response of [Get endpoint addresses](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#55a3f041-17af-4b0d-bf8c-0b959b126428).

item.name: Reference Endpoint
item.description:
The Reference Endpoint can be used to [access a single feed](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#abf8f21c-0f31-4086-ad5e-49d2ec468f43).
The current address of the endpoint is returned in the "ref"-member of the response of [Get endpoint addresses](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#55a3f041-17af-4b0d-bf8c-0b959b126428).

item.name: References Endpoint
item.description:
The References Endpoint is a convenience endpoint which allows to [access all feeds with one call](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#522366eb-5d26-4419-980d-afe6d93c7194).
The current address of the endpoint is returned in the "refs"-member of the response of [Get endpoint addresses](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#55a3f041-17af-4b0d-bf8c-0b959b126428).

item.name: Service Catalogue Endpoint
item.description:
The Service Catalogue Endpoint can be used to maintain a [Service Catalogue](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#a8223ff0-e5d6-4dbd-8c3b-3625b6e460a0).
The current address of the endpoint is returned in the "serviceCatalogue"-member of the response of [Get endpoint addresses](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#55a3f041-17af-4b0d-bf8c-0b959b126428).

The Qiy Node Api uses dynamic path endpoint addresses which can be obtained using [GET /api](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#22714043-ebc0-4a1d-87eb-2d469c8d3b82) and [Get endpoint addresses](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#55a3f041-17af-4b0d-bf8c-0b959b126428).
The addresses can be cached, but should be refreshed every day.

item.name: Servers
item.description:
Digital Me provides the Qiy Node service on different servers.
For details, please refer to [section 2.3 QS User Node Servers](https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node.md#23-qs-user-node-servers) of the [Digital Me Qiy Node specification](https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node.md#1-introduction).

item.name: Connected to Router Event
item.description: A Connected to Router Event is fired after a [request for a connection](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#01a84413-0b4c-47da-948a-824082408b40) and can be [used](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#998dda4b-5549-4054-8596-23c540816c75) to monitor the [creation of a  connection](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#49992baf-fc29-4d81-8ffa-12da0c8493d7).

item.name: Data Reference Received Event-v2
item.description: The Data Reference Received Event-v2 can be used by a Service Provider to obtain a feed from an Individual.

item.name: Persistent Id Event
item.description: A Persistent Id Event is an Event that is fired after a [Connected to Router Event](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#84b8e4ef-5a2a-48a0-a16b-c67ad0288692) and can be [used](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#0868bc6f-1e77-46fe-a11c-aa7a5c079dd6) to detect whether [a connection has been created](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#49992baf-fc29-4d81-8ffa-12da0c8493d7).

item.name: User Action Message Event
item.description: The User Action Message Event is fired by a Qiy Node when it receives a [user action message](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#30a0373f-2ca0-41d6-b712-ba7bc0573dbb) that requires interaction with the End User.

item.name: Qiy Scheme
Qiy Trust Network
Access Provider
item.description: An Access Provider is an organization which provides access to the Qiy Trust Network.

item.name: Application Provider
item.description: An Application Provider is an organization that provides software or computing services which can be used to access the Qiy Trust Network.
The Qiy Trust Network is the operational part of the Qiy Scheme: it enables its users to securely and privately connect and interact.

item.name: Qiy Users
Individual
item.description: An Individual is a natural person that is using the Qiy Trust Network as such.

item.name: Service Provider
Relying Party
item.description: A Relying Party is a Service Provider that is providing services which relies on services provided by other Service Providers.

item.name: Data Provider
item.description: A Data Provider is a Service Provider that provides data services, which may produce Personally Identifiable Information.
A Service Provider is an organization that uses the Qiy Trust Network to provide services to Individuals.
Qiy Users are users of the Qiy Trust Network.

The [Qiy Scheme](https://www.qiyfoundation.org/qiy-scheme/) and the initiated by the [Qiy Foundation](https://www.qiyfoundation.org) is a means to give individuals control over their data while creating value for organisations, see [https://qiy-foundation.org](https://qiy-foundation.org).

item.name: End User App
Setup
item.description:
An End User App can only access the Qiy Trust Network under the following preconditions:
1. The End User App uses a valid [Access Provider Token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#962509fc-cd2a-463d-85e4-f1772c54ff2c).
2. The [End User App correctly authenticates Qiy Node requests](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#962509fc-cd2a-463d-85e4-f1772c54ff2c).
3. The End User App must allow End Users to use a [new Qiy Node](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#de1a3109-4fca-43f8-ab01-11436d62d097) or reuse an existing one.

item.name: Subscribe
item.description:
An Individual can subscribe to a service as follows:
1. Conclude an subscription agreement (out-of-scope).
2. [Connect with the Service Provider](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#6488c78c-9460-4dd1-bb8f-9285d5943167).

item.name: Orchestrate
item.description:
When an End User has subscribed to a Service, the Service Provider may issue [Orchestration Requests](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#1a616f10-1bb8-4646-8b3e-357946599321), which are termed 'Feed Requests' in this document.
The [End User App](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#7428b29e-a414-493a-82e2-b39dabd2d5dc) can process these requests as follows:
1. [Wait for a User Action Message Event](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e66a9caf-54a9-4cd0-8c8a-3e025172016e).
3. Extract the userActionMessageUrl from the 'extraData'-field of the event and use it to [fetch the message](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#30a0373f-2ca0-41d6-b712-ba7bc0573dbb).
4. Extract the feed request containing the options and related actionUrls.
5. Present the request to the End User and capture the result, e.g. the selected options.
6. [Deploy the selected services](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#74e4c492-6047-423d-aab5-5f8576212168) or [change the deployment](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#76cd1722-b1ae-45a3-910c-30fc155db3a4) using the related actionUrls.

An [End User App](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/High-Level%20Architectural%20Overview.md#5-the-application-layer) is a [Qiy Node Client](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#821514ce-5005-4408-be95-a400b6b4181c) which enables an [Individual](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/High-Level%20Architectural%20Overview.md#41-qiy-users) to [subscribe to](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#5656025c-a1e0-4b20-8442-1c5a25d24d89) and [orchestrate](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#b81e75d9-cc97-4be1-ac17-976737e516de) (data) services.

item.name: Service Provider
Setup
On-Connected Endpoint
item.description: An On-Connected Endpoint is a [Technology Service](http://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/archimate3-doc/chap10.html#_Toc489946097) which can be setup and used by a [Service Provider](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e351a4a2-a31a-4b35-af56-8b3d592d1dd4) to  [detect that a connect token has been used to create a connection](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#792c1c8f-532e-4d4d-b71f-8cd601c94ceb).

item.name: Feed Request Endpoint
item.description: A Feed Request Endpoint is a [Technology Service](http://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/archimate3-doc/chap10.html#_Toc489946097) which can be used by a Service Provider to receive [Feed Requests](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#c908455a-867e-4ca3-b8aa-5a293652f840) from [Individuals when they orchestrate the subscribed services](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#b81e75d9-cc97-4be1-ac17-976737e516de).

item.name: Service Endpoint
item.description: A Service Endpoint is a [Technology Service](http://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/archimate3-doc/chap10.html#_Toc489946097) provided by a [Service Provider](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e351a4a2-a31a-4b35-af56-8b3d592d1dd4) to serve [Feed Access requests](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#1a616f10-1bb8-4646-8b3e-357946599321).

item.name: Service Catalogue
item.description:
A [Service Provider](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e351a4a2-a31a-4b35-af56-8b3d592d1dd4) publishes the (data) service types it supports in his Service Catalogue, which consists of an array of urls for service type descriptions with additional details, for example for the associated [Feed Request Endpoints](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e1b569b8-287d-41dc-ad3d-cd576ac1af67).

A Service Type Description can contain a list of urls for the description of the operation types of the service which are used in [Feed Requests](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#1a616f10-1bb8-4646-8b3e-357946599321).
However, if not, the Service Type Description Url must be used instead.

Before a Service Provider can provide services via Qiy he has to make the following preparations:
1. Describe the services and make these descriptions publicly available.
2. Setup an [On-Connect Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e8aa13ba-4301-47c9-81a2-522dc52e296c) for easily processing connect requests.
2. Setup [Feed Request Endpoints](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e1b569b8-287d-41dc-ad3d-cd576ac1af67) for his services.
2. Setup [Service Endpoints]() to serve [feed access requests](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#1a616f10-1bb8-4646-8b3e-357946599321).
3. Prepare the Computer systems to correctly produce [authenticated requests](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#962509fc-cd2a-463d-85e4-f1772c54ff2c).
1. [Contact an Access Provider](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#208534d5-bf93-43af-b644-420ced7caef4) to whitelist the endpoints and receive a [Qiy Node Credential and an Access Provider Token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#962509fc-cd2a-463d-85e4-f1772c54ff2c).
2. Configure the computer system for the Qiy Node.
3. [Publish the Service Catalogue with Qiy](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#a8223ff0-e5d6-4dbd-8c3b-3625b6e460a0).

A [Service Provider](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/High-Level%20Architectural%20Overview.md#42-service-provider) is a [Qiy User](https://github.com/qiyfoundation/Qiy-Scheme/blob/topic/qiy-node-interface/High-Level%20Architectural%20Overview.md#41-qiy-users) that provides [Services](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#a8223ff0-e5d6-4dbd-8c3b-3625b6e460a0) via the Qiy Trust Network.
A Service Provider can be a Relying Party or a Data Provider:
1. A [Data Provider](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#d0c5c5f9-2e94-4b0c-9933-0186d39560be) is a Service Provider that provides data services.
2. A [Relying Party](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#bf6403a7-89b2-4028-95c3-b39d5d444bf3) is a Service Provider that provides Services that depends on other services.

item.name: Qiy Node Client
Qiy Node
Settings
item.description: A Qiy Node can have diferent settings which can be maintained with [node calls](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#53ee086e-0d81-4f0c-9b51-3f5d4f4f039c).

A [Qiy Node](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#37164def-9d2f-4bd7-b942-ba233677eaf6) is an access point for the [Qiy Trust Network](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#37164def-9d2f-4bd7-b942-ba233677eaf6) and can be maintained and used with [node calls](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#53ee086e-0d81-4f0c-9b51-3f5d4f4f039c).

item.name: Connections
item.description:
[Individuals](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#37164def-9d2f-4bd7-b942-ba233677eaf6) can connect and interact with other Individuals and [Service Providers](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#37164def-9d2f-4bd7-b942-ba233677eaf6) using connections between the related [Qiy Nodes](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#37164def-9d2f-4bd7-b942-ba233677eaf6).

Connections can be created between an invitor and an invitee using [connect tokens](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#815d43f7-d59f-4293-994d-1543d244cb1c) as follows:
1. The invitor [requests](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#9251bd1f-c8d9-49e1-91fb-a9a567a68aef) or creates and [registers](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#930a6f9b-00ad-4206-9420-e393cafde2d5) a Connect Token.
2. The invitor invites the invitee to connect with the Connect Token out-of-band.
3. The invitee [requests a connection using the connect token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#01a84413-0b4c-47da-948a-824082408b40).
4. The invitor receives a notification that the connect token has been used to create a connection.
5. The invitee receives a [notification that the connection has been established](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#9803c85c-8046-4a51-9de2-26bbb0bdd89f).

item.name: Connect Tokens
Online Connect Tokens
item.description: An Online Connect Token is a connect token that has been created using a [Request Connect Token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#9251bd1f-c8d9-49e1-91fb-a9a567a68aef).

item.name: Offline Connect Tokens
item.description: An Offline Connect Token is a Connect Token that has been created by a Qiy Node Client and registered later using [Register connect token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#930a6f9b-00ad-4206-9420-e393cafde2d5).

item.name: On-Connected Actions
item.description: An On-Connected Actions is an action such as the execution of a http-request that can be defined for a Connect Token and that is executed whenever the token has been used to create a connection, see for example this [Create connect token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#ee9e6392-201b-4c6b-8c17-ffc236a7af36)-call.

A [Connect Token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#37164def-9d2f-4bd7-b942-ba233677eaf6) can be used to create [connections](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#8a36da9d-6f90-481d-83e7-f5c7398105df) between [Qiy Users](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#37164def-9d2f-4bd7-b942-ba233677eaf6), for example an [Individual](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#6488c78c-9460-4dd1-bb8f-9285d5943167) and a [Service Provider](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#49992baf-fc29-4d81-8ffa-12da0c8493d7).
The connect token can be created by either of the two, but when connecting to a Service Provider it must always be [requested](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#9251bd1f-c8d9-49e1-91fb-a9a567a68aef) or [registered](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#930a6f9b-00ad-4206-9420-e393cafde2d5) by the Service Provider.

item.name: Feeds
item.description:
Feeds can be used by a Relying Party to consume subscribed services of an individual.
A Relying Party can do so as follows:
1. [Request for feeds](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#fcea7385-8304-47b4-96ac-0854e8a46da6) to remotely execute operations of a service by reference.
0. [Wait for the feeds](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#ac3d9f3a-711d-4127-a3d2-300f5ea22e61) and [use them one by one](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#abf8f21c-0f31-4086-ad5e-49d2ec468f43) or
1. [Use polling](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#522366eb-5d26-4419-980d-afe6d93c7194).

item.name: Events
item.description: A Qiy Node can use [Server-Sent Events](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Server-sent_events)-[events](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#a0dfd715-bcb9-4bfd-9a94-c5e97edaeb1f) to communicate with a Qiy Node Client.

item.name: Messages
item.description: [Qiy Users](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#992ea4a2-048f-4046-9664-6a8c7d6cb34b) can use [connections](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#8a36da9d-6f90-481d-83e7-f5c7398105df) to [send](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#9ba1358d-ed56-42ac-8f21-73a9c8dba1ca) and [receive messages](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#1ef027e0-7e0f-431e-9389-5fe1eb8b111e).

A Qiy Node Client is any [Application Service](http://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/archimate3-doc/chap09.html#_Toc489946075) that accesses a Qiy Node.
This section addresses topics that are relevant for developers of both [End User Apps](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#7428b29e-a414-493a-82e2-b39dabd2d5dc) and computer systems of [Service Providers](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e351a4a2-a31a-4b35-af56-8b3d592d1dd4).

header.description: Access Provider Token, see https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node.md#4-authentication

request.description: GET /api can be used to get the [api version](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#af8a7dc6-0ba9-4e3b-a7e5-6b540f1102fc) and the current address of the [Node Create Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#b01e77ea-1ac5-4896-8703-5d5800789024).

header.description: Access Provider Token, see https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node.md#4-authentication

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Credentials
header.description: Indicates whether or not the response to the request can be exposed when the credentials flag is true. When used as part of a response to a preflight request, this indicates whether or not the actual request can be made using credentials.

header.value: Cache-Control, Pragma, Origin, Authorization, Content-Type, X-Requested-With, Set-Cookie, Cookie, Accept, password
header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
header.description: Used in response to a preflight request to indicate which HTTP headers can be used when making the actual request.

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Methods
header.description: Specifies the method or methods allowed when accessing the resource. This is used in response to a preflight request.

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
header.description: Specifies a URI that may access the resource. For requests without credentials, the server may specify '*' as a wildcard, thereby allowing any origin to access the resource.

header.name: Access-Control-Expose-Headers
header.description: Lets a server whitelist headers that browsers are allowed to access.

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: Strict-Transport-Security
header.description: A HSTS Policy informing the HTTP client how long to cache the HTTPS only policy and whether this applies to subdomains.

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

header.name: X-Content-Type-Options
header.description: The only defined value, "nosniff", prevents Internet Explorer from MIME-sniffing a response away from the declared content-type

header.name: X-XSS-Protection
header.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) filter

header.name: tracker
header.description: Custom header
See https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node.md#4-authentication

request.description: This [Node Create Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#b01e77ea-1ac5-4896-8703-5d5800789024)-call can be used to [create a Qiy Node](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#efef253e-5873-4546-9f5d-9e330d85e7f8).

header.description: [Access Provider Token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#962509fc-cd2a-463d-85e4-f1772c54ff2c)

request.description: This [Node Delete Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#0370be24-ad26-4e2b-af33-7a7df3b766c2)-call can be used to [delete a Qiy Node](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#efef253e-5873-4546-9f5d-9e330d85e7f8).

exec: // Use '//Dynamic Endpoint Addresses/Get Api' to the eventsEndpointUrl.

request.description: This [Events Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#220e545c-a66d-4e2a-a0fa-0cb75e473430)-call can be used to start listening to [Qiy Node events]().

This [Node Settings Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#8891782a-45b0-4db1-a23c-25bd6b95c00b)-call returns the [node settings](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#dc161dbb-f4e5-4b62-b26b-975433718438).
This [Node Settings Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#8891782a-45b0-4db1-a23c-25bd6b95c00b)-call sets the [node settings](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#dc161dbb-f4e5-4b62-b26b-975433718438).

exec: // Use '//Dynamic Endpoint Addresses/GET Api' to get the serviceCatalogueEndpointUrl

Access Provider Token, see https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node.md#4-authentication

query.description: If False or None, only external services will be gotten.

request.description: This [Service Catalogue Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#7f081d6c-77f8-4184-9497-7ddf2b74bb00)-call gets the [Service Catalogue](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#089b271b-fdbe-4ee8-80ee-21a487cf4d8a).

header.description: See https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node.md#4-authentication
Access Provider Token, see https://github.com/digital-me/qiy-node/blob/topic/data-reuse/qs-user-node.md#4-authentication

request.description: This [Service Catalogue Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#7f081d6c-77f8-4184-9497-7ddf2b74bb00)-call sets the [Service Catalogue](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#089b271b-fdbe-4ee8-80ee-21a487cf4d8a) including details of [Feed Request Endpoints](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e1b569b8-287d-41dc-ad3d-cd576ac1af67)

This [Connect Token Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e734037d-11a5-4e91-bf84-8744d08ba04c)-call can be used to [request a connect token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#815d43f7-d59f-4293-994d-1543d244cb1c).

This [Connect Token Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e734037d-11a5-4e91-bf84-8744d08ba04c)-call requests a [connect token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#815d43f7-d59f-4293-994d-1543d244cb1c) with an [on-connected action](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#359ea19c-e5cf-4756-8bcf-4b0c6a72b21f) and can be used to detect that a connect token was used to create a connection using a callback to an [On-Connected Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e8aa13ba-4301-47c9-81a2-522dc52e296c).

This [Connect Token Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e734037d-11a5-4e91-bf84-8744d08ba04c)-call registers a [connect token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#815d43f7-d59f-4293-994d-1543d244cb1c).

This [Connect Token Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e734037d-11a5-4e91-bf84-8744d08ba04c)-call registers a [connect token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#815d43f7-d59f-4293-994d-1543d244cb1c) with an [on-connected action](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#359ea19c-e5cf-4756-8bcf-4b0c6a72b21f) and can be used to detect that a connect token was used to create a connection using a callback to an [On-Connected Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e8aa13ba-4301-47c9-81a2-522dc52e296c).

item.name: Wait for callback on On-Connected Endpoint

request.description: This callback on the [On-Connected Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#e8aa13ba-4301-47c9-81a2-522dc52e296c) can be used to [detect that a connect token was used to create a connection](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#8a36da9d-6f90-481d-83e7-f5c7398105df), but only with a connect token that has been [requested](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#ee9e6392-201b-4c6b-8c17-ffc236a7af36) or [registered](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#d7ed9d68-f996-492d-918f-cf7411019ced) with the callback as an [on-connected action](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#359ea19c-e5cf-4756-8bcf-4b0c6a72b21f).

This [Connection Create Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#73b87a63-f9a4-41c1-afc5-930d8f7b353d)-call can be used to [request a connection](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#8a36da9d-6f90-481d-83e7-f5c7398105df), but only when a valid and active [Connect Token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#815d43f7-d59f-4293-994d-1543d244cb1c) is given.

item.name: Wait for Connected to Router Event

exec: // Use '//Dynamic Endpoint Addresses/Get Api' to the eventsEndpointUrl.

request.description: The [Connected to Router Event](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#84b8e4ef-5a2a-48a0-a16b-c67ad0288692) can be used to monitor the [creation of a connection](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#8a36da9d-6f90-481d-83e7-f5c7398105df).

exec: // Use '//Dynamic Endpoint Addresses/Get Api' to the eventsEndpointUrl.

request.description: The [Persistent Id Event](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#9803c85c-8046-4a51-9de2-26bbb0bdd89f) is the second and last event when [creating a connection](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#8a36da9d-6f90-481d-83e7-f5c7398105df).
This [Connection Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#179d919c-3a87-4dc0-8aef-7c8d97e4b4f8)-call returns [connection details](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#8a36da9d-6f90-481d-83e7-f5c7398105df).

This [Connections List Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#ef3d0b04-f3ff-41e6-8b87-1e5ef0b885b6)-call can be used to list [connections](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#8a36da9d-6f90-481d-83e7-f5c7398105df).

The Get connect token request can be used to get the details of a [Connect Token](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#815d43f7-d59f-4293-994d-1543d244cb1c), using a connectionUrl that has been returned in the Location header of the response of a [Create Token Request](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#b8ad134d-b693-48d7-bdac-5a9a63be319f).

response.name: Get connect token - OK

request.description: This [Connect Token List Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#810b87f6-54d1-47e0-afd5-e6ea15f34596)-call lists the [connect tokens](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#815d43f7-d59f-4293-994d-1543d244cb1c).

This [Mailbox Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#2f065134-6a80-49f4-869b-1ff8308544db)-call lists [messages](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#2a0c6c4b-bd2a-4b65-9282-bfdad3c1da81).

item.name: Consents
item.description: To be specified.

request.description: A [Relying Party](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#3ec67316-76d5-4e42-bc26-5d893d7686bb) uses this [Mailbox Endpoint](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#2f065134-6a80-49f4-869b-1ff8308544db)-call to requests for a [feed](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#580a707c-16e8-40b3-9ae4-c51ffa096033).

item.name: Wait for Data Reference Received Event-v2

exec: // Use '//Dynamic Endpoint Addresses/Get Api' to the eventsEndpointUrl.

request.description: A Relying Party can use the [Data Reference Received Event-v2](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#6a83bdd6-5a06-4022-8864-db5e1f75d01d) to detect the [receipt of a feed](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#580a707c-16e8-40b3-9ae4-c51ffa096033).

item.name: Wait for User Action Message Event

exec: // Use '//Dynamic Endpoint Addresses/Get Api' to the eventsEndpointUrl.

request.description: An End User App can use the [User Action Message Event](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#746ea152-a210-4ab2-9a2f-8a497ed78799) to detect the [receipt of a feed request](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#b81e75d9-cc97-4be1-ac17-976737e516de).

exec: // Extract the orchestrationRequestUrl from the 'extraData'-member of the 'USER_ACION_MESSAGE'-event.

request.description: A Qiy Node Client can use this call to get the details of a received message that requires user interaction using a userActionMessageUrl extracted from a [User Action Message Event](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#746ea152-a210-4ab2-9a2f-8a497ed78799).
An End User App uses this call to [change the service deployment](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#b81e75d9-cc97-4be1-ac17-976737e516de).
An End User App uses this call to [deploy (an operation of) a service](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#b81e75d9-cc97-4be1-ac17-976737e516de).

item.name: Getting help
item.description: Please contact the [Service Desk](https://qiy.api.digital-me.nl/#208534d5-bf93-43af-b644-420ced7caef4)
